parameters.name: Dealed
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the vulnerability is fixed. Valid values:

*   **y**: the vulnerability is fixed.
*   **n**: the vulnerability is not fixed.

parameters.name: FieldName
parameters.description: The name of the search field that is used to query containers.

parameters.name: FieldValue
parameters.description: The value of the search field that is used to query containers.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the asset group.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Level
parameters.description:
The severity of the vulnerability. Separate multiple severities with commas (,). Valid values:

*   **high**
*   **medium**
*   **low**

parameters.name: Necessity
parameters.description:
The priority based on which the vulnerability is fixed. Separate multiple priorities with commas (,). Valid values:

*   **asap**: high
*   **later**: medium
*   **nntf**: low

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The remarks for the asset affected by the vulnerability. The value can be the private IP address, public IP address, or name of the asset. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: SearchTags
parameters.description: The tags that are used to search for the vulnerability.

parameters.name: StatusList
parameters.description:
The status of the vulnerability. Separate multiple states with commas (,). Valid values:

*   **1**: unfixed
*   **2**: fix failed

parameters.name: TargetType
parameters.description:
The type of the query condition. Valid values:

*   **containerId**: the ID of the container
*   **uuid**: the ID of the asset

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the vulnerability. Valid values:

*   **cve**: Linux software vulnerability
*   **sys**: Windows system vulnerability

parameters.name: VpcInstanceIds
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) in which the vulnerability is detected. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: VulNames
parameters.description:
An array that consists of the names of vulnerabilities.

>  You can call the [DescribeGroupedVul](~~DescribeGroupedVul~~) operation to obtain the names of vulnerabilities.
